Name: World Of Mana
About the game: You can play with many people with a map made with the map editor and share the created map. You can set up individual or team battles and become a team to catch monsters, escape mazes, or fight each other. If you have an MMO RPG that you enjoyed playing as a child, you can create a map representing that game using the map editor in World of Mana. make it and enjoy it #Make Happiness #World of Mana
